title: EduHub Bangla
description: EduHub Bangla is a platform that connects users with educational service providers, making it easier to book and manage educational services.
challengesFaced: Managing different dashboards for users and providers
Ensuring a smooth and responsive user experience
potentialImprovements: Implementing a rating & review system for providers
Enhancing the interactive forum with real-time discussions

title: CineHive
description: CineHive is a movie discovery platform where users can explore movies, track favorites, and stay updated on upcoming releases.
challengesFaced: Efficiently managing movie data and search functionality
Designing a user-friendly interface for movie tracking
Ensuring seamless API integration for fetching movie details
potentialImprovements: Implementing a recommendation engine based on user preferences
Creating a watchlist feature for upcoming releases

title: Beautiful Bangladesh
description: Beautiful Bangladesh is an eco-tourism platform that promotes sustainable travel experiences in Bangladesh.
challengesFaced: Creating an engaging visual experience with animations
Integrating interactive image sliders and smooth navigation
Ensuring mobile responsiveness for a seamless browsing experience
potentialImprovements: Introducing a booking system for eco-friendly travel packages
Adding a blog section for travel guides & tips
Implementing a user review & rating system for destinations
